descriptionNullable:
![Google Doodles Image](https://www.stikkymedia.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/doodle4google-scaled-1200x630-cropped.jpg)

# Introduction

When you visit Google.com, sometimes there is special Logo of Google letters. and people might be surprised and delighted. Have you ever see this?
All of there Doodle Images created by some creators as known as 'Doodlers'. It means, all of images are from human creativity.
If you are interested in generating image and recognize features and context from image, you should look at this dataset.

# Acknowledgements

The data is mainly for Images and information from Google Doodle. I have get information from Google's API as json, and have cleaned data to csv.

## What is Google Doodle?

A Google Doodle is a special, temporary alteration of the logo on Google's homepages intended to commemorate holidays, events, achievements, and notable historical figures of particular countries. The first Google Doodle honored the 1998 edition of the long-running annual Burning Man event in Black Rock City, Nevada, and was designed by co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin to notify users of their absence in case the servers crashed.

\- from Wikipedia

## How many doodles has Google done over the years?
The team has created over 5000 doodles for our homepages around the world.

\- from About page at Google Doodles

# Content

One of example is for Children's Day 2014:

![Sample](https://www.google.com/logos/doodles/2014/childrens-day-2014-costa-rica-4985723144896512.3-hp.gif)

## list.csv

The list of information for Google Doodles with:

| Column | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | Integer | Posted year of Doodle image |
| month | Integer | Posted month of Doodle image |
| day | Integer | Posted day of Doodle image |
| name | String | The name of Doodle as slug. you can see the details on `https://www.google.com/doodles/` |
| title | String | The title of Doodle image |
| query | String | The keywords about this |
| share_text | String | An short description with hash tag `#` |
| url | String | URL of Doodle image |
| alternate_url | String | The alternative URL of Doodle image |
| high_res\_url | String | URL of Doodle image with high resolution |
| high_res\_width | Integer | The width of Doodle image with high resolution |
| high_res\_height | Integer | The width of Doodle image with high resolution |

## translations.csv

Translated blog posts and written by which language

| Column | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | Integer | Posted year of Doodle image |
| month | Integer | Posted month of Doodle image |
| day | Integer | Posted day of Doodle image |
| language | String | The target language in lang code |
| query | String | The keywords about this |
| hover_text | String | The alternative text for image |
| share_text | String | An short description with hash tag `#` |
| blog_post | String | HTML Text for blog post |

## See more 

https://www.google.com/doodles

---

Do you think that AI can defeat creativity of human being?

Happy kaggling y'all!
title: Google Doodles since 1999 (Weekly Update!)
subtitle: Google Doodles (1999/10 ~ current)
